conbody.p: As prescribed in 1847.305-70(a), insert the following clause:

__ [Insert number of work days] work days prior to shipping item(s) _____________ [Insert items to be shipped], the Contractor shall furnish the anticipated shipment date, bill of lading number (if applicable), and carrier identity to _______________ [Insert individual(s) to receive notification] and to the Contracting Officer.
